name: Bubble Blowout
description: There are bubbles everywhere in Bubble Blowout! Use your cannon at the bottom of the screen to match-3 or more bubbles, and clear the entire screen to progress.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Service Pack 2 (SP2), Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1.0 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: vCard with DirectX 9.0 support Storage: 70 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: vCard with DirectX 9.0 support Storage: 70 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Very very very basic match-3 bubble game. There are no power-ups, there is no strategy and only 21 easy levels. + the background picture is so crowded that it's just difficult to see the bubbles sometimes. Very bad for the eyes.  If you want to play a game similar to this - there are LOTS of better free alternatives on the web. And if you want more serious one - get Dynomite Deluxe.
